SERVER_RESTART_REQUIRED.name: Restart required
SERVER_RESTART_REQUIRED.description: A setting has been changed which requires a server restart

_GLOBAL_WARNING.name: Active warning codes
_GLOBAL_WARNING.description: A dict of active warning codes

INVENTREE_INSTANCE_ID.name: Instance ID
INVENTREE_INSTANCE_ID.description: Unique identifier for this InvenTree instance

INVENTREE_ANNOUNCE_ID.name: Announce ID
INVENTREE_ANNOUNCE_ID.description: Announce the instance ID of the server in the server status info (unauthenticated)

INVENTREE_INSTANCE.name: Server Instance Name
INVENTREE_INSTANCE.description: String descriptor for the server instance

INVENTREE_INSTANCE_TITLE.name: Use instance name
INVENTREE_INSTANCE_TITLE.description: Use the instance name in the title-bar

INVENTREE_RESTRICT_ABOUT.name: Restrict showing `about`
INVENTREE_RESTRICT_ABOUT.description: Show the `about` modal only to superusers

INVENTREE_DEFAULT_CURRENCY.name: Default Currency
INVENTREE_DEFAULT_CURRENCY.description: Select base currency for pricing calculations

CURRENCY_UPDATE_INTERVAL.name: Currency Update Interval
CURRENCY_UPDATE_INTERVAL.description: How often to update exchange rates (set to zero to disable)

INVENTREE_DOWNLOAD_FROM_URL.name: Download from URL
INVENTREE_DOWNLOAD_FROM_URL.description: Allow download of remote images and files from external URL

INVENTREE_DOWNLOAD_IMAGE_MAX_SIZE.name: Download Size Limit
INVENTREE_DOWNLOAD_IMAGE_MAX_SIZE.description: Maximum allowable download size for remote image

INVENTREE_DOWNLOAD_FROM_URL_USER_AGENT.name: User-agent used to download from URL
INVENTREE_DOWNLOAD_FROM_URL_USER_AGENT.description: Allow to override the user-agent used to download images and files from external URL (leave blank for the default)

INVENTREE_STRICT_URLS.name: Strict URL Validation
INVENTREE_STRICT_URLS.description: Require schema specification when validating URLs

INVENTREE_UPDATE_CHECK_INTERVAL.name: Update Check Interval
INVENTREE_UPDATE_CHECK_INTERVAL.description: How often to check for updates (set to zero to disable)

INVENTREE_BACKUP_ENABLE.name: Automatic Backup
INVENTREE_BACKUP_ENABLE.description: Enable automatic backup of database and media files

INVENTREE_BACKUP_DAYS.name: Auto Backup Interval
INVENTREE_BACKUP_DAYS.description: Specify number of days between automated backup events

INVENTREE_DELETE_TASKS_DAYS.name: Task Deletion Interval
INVENTREE_DELETE_TASKS_DAYS.description: Background task results will be deleted after specified number of days

INVENTREE_DELETE_ERRORS_DAYS.name: Error Log Deletion Interval
INVENTREE_DELETE_ERRORS_DAYS.description: Error logs will be deleted after specified number of days

INVENTREE_DELETE_NOTIFICATIONS_DAYS.name: Notification Deletion Interval
INVENTREE_DELETE_NOTIFICATIONS_DAYS.description: User notifications will be deleted after specified number of days

INVENTREE_DELETE_EMAIL_DAYS.name: Email Deletion Interval
INVENTREE_DELETE_EMAIL_DAYS.description: Email messages will be deleted after specified number of days

INVENTREE_PROTECT_EMAIL_LOG.name: Protect Email Log
INVENTREE_PROTECT_EMAIL_LOG.description: Prevent deletion of email log entries

BARCODE_ENABLE.name: Barcode Support
BARCODE_ENABLE.description: Enable barcode scanner support in the web interface

BARCODE_STORE_RESULTS.name: Store Barcode Results
BARCODE_STORE_RESULTS.description: Store barcode scan results in the database

BARCODE_RESULTS_MAX_NUM.name: Barcode Scans Maximum Count
BARCODE_RESULTS_MAX_NUM.description: Maximum number of barcode scan results to store

BARCODE_WEBCAM_SUPPORT.name: Barcode Webcam Support
BARCODE_WEBCAM_SUPPORT.description: Allow barcode scanning via webcam in browser

BARCODE_SHOW_TEXT.name: Barcode Show Data
BARCODE_SHOW_TEXT.description: Display barcode data in browser as text

BARCODE_GENERATION_PLUGIN.name: Barcode Generation Plugin
BARCODE_GENERATION_PLUGIN.description: Plugin to use for internal barcode data generation

PART_REVISION_ASSEMBLY_ONLY.name: Assembly Revision Only
PART_REVISION_ASSEMBLY_ONLY.description: Only allow revisions for assembly parts

PART_ALLOW_DELETE_FROM_ASSEMBLY.name: Allow Deletion from Assembly
PART_ALLOW_DELETE_FROM_ASSEMBLY.description: Allow deletion of parts which are used in an assembly

PART_IPN_REGEX.name: IPN Regex
PART_IPN_REGEX.description: Regular expression pattern for matching Part IPN

PART_ALLOW_DUPLICATE_IPN.name: Allow Duplicate IPN
PART_ALLOW_DUPLICATE_IPN.description: Allow multiple parts to share the same IPN

PART_ALLOW_EDIT_IPN.name: Allow Editing IPN
PART_ALLOW_EDIT_IPN.description: Allow changing the IPN value while editing a part

PART_COPY_BOM.name: Copy Part BOM Data
PART_COPY_BOM.description: Copy BOM data by default when duplicating a part

PART_COPY_PARAMETERS.name: Copy Part Parameter Data
PART_COPY_PARAMETERS.description: Copy parameter data by default when duplicating a part

PART_COPY_TESTS.name: Copy Part Test Data
PART_COPY_TESTS.description: Copy test data by default when duplicating a part

PART_CATEGORY_PARAMETERS.name: Copy Category Parameter Templates
PART_CATEGORY_PARAMETERS.description: Copy category parameter templates when creating a part

PART_ASSEMBLY.name: Assembly
PART_ASSEMBLY.description: Parts can be assembled from other components by default

PART_COMPONENT.name: Component
PART_COMPONENT.description: Parts can be used as sub-components by default

PART_SHOW_RELATED.name: Show related parts
PART_SHOW_RELATED.description: Display related parts for a part

PART_CREATE_INITIAL.name: Initial Stock Data
PART_CREATE_INITIAL.description: Allow creation of initial stock when adding a new part

PART_CREATE_SUPPLIER.name: Initial Supplier Data
PART_CREATE_SUPPLIER.description: Allow creation of initial supplier data when adding a new part

PART_NAME_FORMAT.name: Part Name Display Format
PART_NAME_FORMAT.description: Format to display the part name
PART_NAME_FORMAT.default: {{ part.IPN if part.IPN }}{{ ' | ' if part.IPN }}{{ part.name }}{{ ' | ' if part.revision }}{{ part.revision if part.revision }}

PART_CATEGORY_DEFAULT_ICON.name: Part Category Default Icon
PART_CATEGORY_DEFAULT_ICON.description: Part category default icon (empty means no icon)

PART_PARAMETER_ENFORCE_UNITS.name: Enforce Parameter Units
PART_PARAMETER_ENFORCE_UNITS.description: If units are provided, parameter values must match the specified units

PRICING_DECIMAL_PLACES_MIN.name: Minimum Pricing Decimal Places
PRICING_DECIMAL_PLACES_MIN.description: Minimum number of decimal places to display when rendering pricing data

PRICING_DECIMAL_PLACES.name: Maximum Pricing Decimal Places
PRICING_DECIMAL_PLACES.description: Maximum number of decimal places to display when rendering pricing data

PRICING_USE_SUPPLIER_PRICING.name: Use Supplier Pricing
PRICING_USE_SUPPLIER_PRICING.description: Include supplier price breaks in overall pricing calculations

PRICING_PURCHASE_HISTORY_OVERRIDES_SUPPL.name: Purchase History Override
PRICING_PURCHASE_HISTORY_OVERRIDES_SUPPL.description: Historical purchase order pricing overrides supplier price breaks

PRICING_USE_STOCK_PRICING.name: Use Stock Item Pricing
PRICING_USE_STOCK_PRICING.description: Use pricing from manually entered stock data for pricing calculations

PRICING_STOCK_ITEM_AGE_DAYS.name: Stock Item Pricing Age
PRICING_STOCK_ITEM_AGE_DAYS.description: Exclude stock items older than this number of days from pricing calculations

PRICING_USE_VARIANT_PRICING.name: Use Variant Pricing
PRICING_USE_VARIANT_PRICING.description: Include variant pricing in overall pricing calculations

PRICING_ACTIVE_VARIANTS.name: Active Variants Only
PRICING_ACTIVE_VARIANTS.description: Only use active variant parts for calculating variant pricing

PRICING_AUTO_UPDATE.name: Auto Update Pricing
PRICING_AUTO_UPDATE.description: Automatically update part pricing when internal data changes

PRICING_UPDATE_DAYS.name: Pricing Rebuild Interval
PRICING_UPDATE_DAYS.description: Number of days before part pricing is automatically updated

PART_BOM_USE_INTERNAL_PRICE.name: Internal Price Override
PART_BOM_USE_INTERNAL_PRICE.description: If available, internal prices override price range calculations

LABEL_ENABLE.name: Enable label printing
LABEL_ENABLE.description: Enable label printing from the web interface

LABEL_DPI.name: Label Image DPI
LABEL_DPI.description: DPI resolution when generating image files to supply to label printing plugins

REPORT_DEBUG_MODE.name: Debug Mode
REPORT_DEBUG_MODE.description: Generate reports in debug mode (HTML output)

REPORT_LOG_ERRORS.name: Log Report Errors
REPORT_LOG_ERRORS.description: Log errors which occur when generating reports

REPORT_DEFAULT_PAGE_SIZE.name: Page Size
REPORT_DEFAULT_PAGE_SIZE.description: Default page size for PDF reports

SERIAL_NUMBER_GLOBALLY_UNIQUE.name: Globally Unique Serials
SERIAL_NUMBER_GLOBALLY_UNIQUE.description: Serial numbers for stock items must be globally unique

STOCK_DELETE_DEPLETED_DEFAULT.name: Delete Depleted Stock
STOCK_DELETE_DEPLETED_DEFAULT.description: Determines default behavior when a stock item is depleted

STOCK_BATCH_CODE_TEMPLATE.name: Batch Code Template
STOCK_BATCH_CODE_TEMPLATE.description: Template for generating default batch codes for stock items

STOCK_STALE_DAYS.name: Stock Stale Time
STOCK_STALE_DAYS.description: Number of days stock items are considered stale before expiring

STOCK_OWNERSHIP_CONTROL.name: Stock Ownership Control
STOCK_OWNERSHIP_CONTROL.description: Enable ownership control over stock locations and items

STOCK_LOCATION_DEFAULT_ICON.name: Stock Location Default Icon
STOCK_LOCATION_DEFAULT_ICON.description: Stock location default icon (empty means no icon)

STOCK_SHOW_INSTALLED_ITEMS.name: Show Installed Stock Items
STOCK_SHOW_INSTALLED_ITEMS.description: Display installed stock items in stock tables

STOCK_ENFORCE_BOM_INSTALLATION.name: Check BOM when installing items
STOCK_ENFORCE_BOM_INSTALLATION.description: Installed stock items must exist in the BOM for the parent part

STOCK_ALLOW_OUT_OF_STOCK_TRANSFER.name: Allow Out of Stock Transfer
STOCK_ALLOW_OUT_OF_STOCK_TRANSFER.description: Allow stock items which are not in stock to be transferred between stock locations

BUILDORDER_REFERENCE_PATTERN.name: Build Order Reference Pattern
BUILDORDER_REFERENCE_PATTERN.description: Required pattern for generating Build Order reference field

BUILDORDER_REQUIRE_RESPONSIBLE.name: Require Responsible Owner
BUILDORDER_REQUIRE_RESPONSIBLE.description: A responsible owner must be assigned to each order

BUILDORDER_REQUIRE_ACTIVE_PART.name: Require Active Part
BUILDORDER_REQUIRE_ACTIVE_PART.description: Prevent build order creation for inactive parts

BUILDORDER_REQUIRE_LOCKED_PART.name: Require Locked Part
BUILDORDER_REQUIRE_LOCKED_PART.description: Prevent build order creation for unlocked parts

BUILDORDER_REQUIRE_VALID_BOM.name: Require Valid BOM
BUILDORDER_REQUIRE_VALID_BOM.description: Prevent build order creation unless BOM has been validated

BUILDORDER_REQUIRE_CLOSED_CHILDS.name: Require Closed Child Orders
BUILDORDER_REQUIRE_CLOSED_CHILDS.description: Prevent build order completion until all child orders are closed

PREVENT_BUILD_COMPLETION_HAVING_INCOMPLE.name: Block Until Tests Pass
PREVENT_BUILD_COMPLETION_HAVING_INCOMPLE.description: Prevent build outputs from being completed until all required tests pass

RETURNORDER_ENABLED.name: Enable Return Orders
RETURNORDER_ENABLED.description: Enable return order functionality in the user interface

RETURNORDER_REFERENCE_PATTERN.name: Return Order Reference Pattern
RETURNORDER_REFERENCE_PATTERN.description: Required pattern for generating Return Order reference field

RETURNORDER_REQUIRE_RESPONSIBLE.name: Require Responsible Owner
RETURNORDER_REQUIRE_RESPONSIBLE.description: A responsible owner must be assigned to each order

RETURNORDER_EDIT_COMPLETED_ORDERS.name: Edit Completed Return Orders
RETURNORDER_EDIT_COMPLETED_ORDERS.description: Allow editing of return orders after they have been completed

SALESORDER_REFERENCE_PATTERN.name: Sales Order Reference Pattern
SALESORDER_REFERENCE_PATTERN.description: Required pattern for generating Sales Order reference field

SALESORDER_REQUIRE_RESPONSIBLE.name: Require Responsible Owner
SALESORDER_REQUIRE_RESPONSIBLE.description: A responsible owner must be assigned to each order

SALESORDER_DEFAULT_SHIPMENT.name: Sales Order Default Shipment
SALESORDER_DEFAULT_SHIPMENT.description: Enable creation of default shipment with sales orders

SALESORDER_EDIT_COMPLETED_ORDERS.name: Edit Completed Sales Orders
SALESORDER_EDIT_COMPLETED_ORDERS.description: Allow editing of sales orders after they have been shipped or completed

SALESORDER_SHIP_COMPLETE.name: Mark Shipped Orders as Complete
SALESORDER_SHIP_COMPLETE.description: Sales orders marked as shipped will automatically be completed, bypassing the "shipped" status

PURCHASEORDER_REFERENCE_PATTERN.name: Purchase Order Reference Pattern
PURCHASEORDER_REFERENCE_PATTERN.description: Required pattern for generating Purchase Order reference field

PURCHASEORDER_REQUIRE_RESPONSIBLE.name: Require Responsible Owner
PURCHASEORDER_REQUIRE_RESPONSIBLE.description: A responsible owner must be assigned to each order

PURCHASEORDER_EDIT_COMPLETED_ORDERS.name: Edit Completed Purchase Orders
PURCHASEORDER_EDIT_COMPLETED_ORDERS.description: Allow editing of purchase orders after they have been shipped or completed

PURCHASEORDER_CONVERT_CURRENCY.name: Convert Currency
PURCHASEORDER_CONVERT_CURRENCY.description: Convert item value to base currency when receiving stock

PURCHASEORDER_AUTO_COMPLETE.name: Auto Complete Purchase Orders
PURCHASEORDER_AUTO_COMPLETE.description: Automatically mark purchase orders as complete when all line items are received

LOGIN_ENABLE_PWD_FORGOT.name: Enable password forgot
LOGIN_ENABLE_PWD_FORGOT.description: Enable password forgot function on the login pages

LOGIN_ENABLE_REG.name: Enable registration
LOGIN_ENABLE_REG.description: Enable self-registration for users on the login pages

LOGIN_ENABLE_SSO.name: Enable SSO
LOGIN_ENABLE_SSO.description: Enable SSO on the login pages

LOGIN_ENABLE_SSO_REG.name: Enable SSO registration
LOGIN_ENABLE_SSO_REG.description: Enable self-registration via SSO for users on the login pages

LOGIN_ENABLE_SSO_GROUP_SYNC.name: Enable SSO group sync
LOGIN_ENABLE_SSO_GROUP_SYNC.description: Enable synchronizing InvenTree groups with groups provided by the IdP

SSO_GROUP_KEY.name: SSO group key
SSO_GROUP_KEY.description: The name of the groups claim attribute provided by the IdP

SSO_GROUP_MAP.name: SSO group map
SSO_GROUP_MAP.description: A mapping from SSO groups to local InvenTree groups. If the local group does not exist, it will be created.

SSO_REMOVE_GROUPS.name: Remove groups outside of SSO
SSO_REMOVE_GROUPS.description: Whether groups assigned to the user should be removed if they are not backend by the IdP. Disabling this setting might cause security issues

LOGIN_MAIL_REQUIRED.name: Email required
LOGIN_MAIL_REQUIRED.description: Require user to supply mail on signup

LOGIN_SIGNUP_SSO_AUTO.name: Auto-fill SSO users
LOGIN_SIGNUP_SSO_AUTO.description: Automatically fill out user-details from SSO account-data

LOGIN_SIGNUP_MAIL_TWICE.name: Mail twice
LOGIN_SIGNUP_MAIL_TWICE.description: On signup ask users twice for their mail

LOGIN_SIGNUP_PWD_TWICE.name: Password twice
LOGIN_SIGNUP_PWD_TWICE.description: On signup ask users twice for their password

LOGIN_SIGNUP_MAIL_RESTRICTION.name: Allowed domains
LOGIN_SIGNUP_MAIL_RESTRICTION.description: Restrict signup to certain domains (comma-separated, starting with @)

SIGNUP_GROUP.name: Group on signup
SIGNUP_GROUP.description: Group to which new users are assigned on registration. If SSO group sync is enabled, this group is only set if no group can be assigned from the IdP.

PLUGIN_ON_STARTUP.name: Check plugins on startup
PLUGIN_ON_STARTUP.description: Check that all plugins are installed on startup - enable in container environments

PLUGIN_UPDATE_CHECK.name: Check for plugin updates
PLUGIN_UPDATE_CHECK.description: Enable periodic checks for updates to installed plugins

ENABLE_PLUGINS_URL.name: Enable URL integration
ENABLE_PLUGINS_URL.description: Enable plugins to add URL routes

ENABLE_PLUGINS_NAVIGATION.name: Enable navigation integration
ENABLE_PLUGINS_NAVIGATION.description: Enable plugins to integrate into navigation

ENABLE_PLUGINS_SCHEDULE.name: Enable schedule integration
ENABLE_PLUGINS_SCHEDULE.description: Enable plugins to run scheduled tasks

ENABLE_PLUGINS_EVENTS.name: Enable event integration
ENABLE_PLUGINS_EVENTS.description: Enable plugins to respond to internal events

ENABLE_PLUGINS_INTERFACE.name: Enable interface integration
ENABLE_PLUGINS_INTERFACE.description: Enable plugins to integrate into the user interface

ENABLE_PLUGINS_MAILS.name: Enable mail integration
ENABLE_PLUGINS_MAILS.description: Enable plugins to process outgoing/incoming mails

PROJECT_CODES_ENABLED.name: Enable project codes
PROJECT_CODES_ENABLED.description: Enable project codes for tracking projects

STOCKTAKE_ENABLE.name: Enable Stock History
STOCKTAKE_ENABLE.description: Enable functionality for recording historical stock levels and value

STOCKTAKE_EXCLUDE_EXTERNAL.name: Exclude External Locations
STOCKTAKE_EXCLUDE_EXTERNAL.description: Exclude stock items in external locations from stock history calculations

STOCKTAKE_AUTO_DAYS.name: Automatic Stocktake Period
STOCKTAKE_AUTO_DAYS.description: Number of days between automatic stock history recording

STOCKTAKE_DELETE_OLD_ENTRIES.name: Delete Old Stock History Entries
STOCKTAKE_DELETE_OLD_ENTRIES.description: Delete stock history entries older than the specified number of days

STOCKTAKE_DELETE_DAYS.name: Stock History Deletion Interval
STOCKTAKE_DELETE_DAYS.description: Stock history entries will be deleted after specified number of days

DISPLAY_FULL_NAMES.name: Display Users full names
DISPLAY_FULL_NAMES.description: Display Users full names instead of usernames

DISPLAY_PROFILE_INFO.name: Display User Profiles
DISPLAY_PROFILE_INFO.description: Display Users Profiles on their profile page

TEST_STATION_DATA.name: Enable Test Station Data
TEST_STATION_DATA.description: Enable test station data collection for test results

LABEL_INLINE.name: Inline label display
LABEL_INLINE.description: Display PDF labels in the browser, instead of downloading as a file

LABEL_DEFAULT_PRINTER.name: Default label printer
LABEL_DEFAULT_PRINTER.description: Configure which label printer should be selected by default

REPORT_INLINE.name: Inline report display
REPORT_INLINE.description: Display PDF reports in the browser, instead of downloading as a file

SEARCH_PREVIEW_SHOW_PARTS.name: Search Parts
SEARCH_PREVIEW_SHOW_PARTS.description: Display parts in search preview window

SEARCH_PREVIEW_SHOW_SUPPLIER_PARTS.name: Search Supplier Parts
SEARCH_PREVIEW_SHOW_SUPPLIER_PARTS.description: Display supplier parts in search preview window

SEARCH_PREVIEW_SHOW_MANUFACTURER_PARTS.name: Search Manufacturer Parts
SEARCH_PREVIEW_SHOW_MANUFACTURER_PARTS.description: Display manufacturer parts in search preview window

SEARCH_HIDE_INACTIVE_PARTS.name: Hide Inactive Parts
SEARCH_HIDE_INACTIVE_PARTS.description: Excluded inactive parts from search preview window

SEARCH_PREVIEW_SHOW_CATEGORIES.name: Search Categories
SEARCH_PREVIEW_SHOW_CATEGORIES.description: Display part categories in search preview window

SEARCH_PREVIEW_SHOW_STOCK.name: Search Stock
SEARCH_PREVIEW_SHOW_STOCK.description: Display stock items in search preview window

SEARCH_PREVIEW_HIDE_UNAVAILABLE_STOCK.name: Hide Unavailable Stock Items
SEARCH_PREVIEW_HIDE_UNAVAILABLE_STOCK.description: Exclude stock items which are not available from the search preview window

SEARCH_PREVIEW_SHOW_LOCATIONS.name: Search Locations
SEARCH_PREVIEW_SHOW_LOCATIONS.description: Display stock locations in search preview window

SEARCH_PREVIEW_SHOW_COMPANIES.name: Search Companies
SEARCH_PREVIEW_SHOW_COMPANIES.description: Display companies in search preview window

SEARCH_PREVIEW_SHOW_BUILD_ORDERS.name: Search Build Orders
SEARCH_PREVIEW_SHOW_BUILD_ORDERS.description: Display build orders in search preview window

SEARCH_PREVIEW_SHOW_PURCHASE_ORDERS.name: Search Purchase Orders
SEARCH_PREVIEW_SHOW_PURCHASE_ORDERS.description: Display purchase orders in search preview window

SEARCH_PREVIEW_EXCLUDE_INACTIVE_PURCHASE.name: Exclude Inactive Purchase Orders
SEARCH_PREVIEW_EXCLUDE_INACTIVE_PURCHASE.description: Exclude inactive purchase orders from search preview window

SEARCH_PREVIEW_SHOW_SALES_ORDERS.name: Search Sales Orders
SEARCH_PREVIEW_SHOW_SALES_ORDERS.description: Display sales orders in search preview window

SEARCH_PREVIEW_EXCLUDE_INACTIVE_SALES_OR.name: Exclude Inactive Sales Orders
SEARCH_PREVIEW_EXCLUDE_INACTIVE_SALES_OR.description: Exclude inactive sales orders from search preview window

SEARCH_PREVIEW_SHOW_SALES_ORDER_SHIPMENT.name: Search Sales Order Shipments
SEARCH_PREVIEW_SHOW_SALES_ORDER_SHIPMENT.description: Display sales order shipments in search preview window

SEARCH_PREVIEW_SHOW_RETURN_ORDERS.name: Search Return Orders
SEARCH_PREVIEW_SHOW_RETURN_ORDERS.description: Display return orders in search preview window

SEARCH_PREVIEW_EXCLUDE_INACTIVE_RETURN_O.name: Exclude Inactive Return Orders
SEARCH_PREVIEW_EXCLUDE_INACTIVE_RETURN_O.description: Exclude inactive return orders from search preview window

SEARCH_PREVIEW_RESULTS.name: Search Preview Results
SEARCH_PREVIEW_RESULTS.description: Number of results to show in each section of the search preview window

SEARCH_REGEX.name: Regex Search
SEARCH_REGEX.description: Enable regular expressions in search queries

SEARCH_WHOLE.name: Whole Word Search
SEARCH_WHOLE.description: Search queries return results for whole word matches

SEARCH_NOTES.name: Search Notes
SEARCH_NOTES.description: Search queries return results for matches from the item's notes

FORMS_CLOSE_USING_ESCAPE.name: Escape Key Closes Forms
FORMS_CLOSE_USING_ESCAPE.description: Use the escape key to close modal forms

STICKY_HEADER.name: Fixed Navbar
STICKY_HEADER.description: The navbar position is fixed to the top of the screen

STICKY_TABLE_HEADER.name: Fixed Table Headers
STICKY_TABLE_HEADER.description: Table headers are fixed to the top of the table

ICONS_IN_NAVBAR.name: Navigation Icons
ICONS_IN_NAVBAR.description: Display icons in the navigation bar

DISPLAY_STOCKTAKE_TAB.name: Show Stock History
DISPLAY_STOCKTAKE_TAB.description: Display stock history information in the part detail page

ENABLE_LAST_BREADCRUMB.name: Show Last Breadcrumb
ENABLE_LAST_BREADCRUMB.description: Show the current page in breadcrumbs

SHOW_FULL_LOCATION_IN_TABLES.name: Show full stock location in tables
SHOW_FULL_LOCATION_IN_TABLES.description: Disabled: The full location path is displayed as a hover tooltip. Enabled: The full location path is displayed as plain text.

SHOW_FULL_CATEGORY_IN_TABLES.name: Show full part categories in tables
SHOW_FULL_CATEGORY_IN_TABLES.description: Disabled: The full category path is displayed as a hover tooltip. Enabled: The full category path is displayed as plain text.

LAST_USED_PRINTING_MACHINES.name: Last used printing machines
LAST_USED_PRINTING_MACHINES.description: Save the last used printing machines for a user
